full_summary:
# Invitation to Tender

**Project Title**
Street Lights Installation at Sherbrooke Research and Development Centre (RDC Sherbrooke)

**Reference Number**
cb-6985-30871302

**Entity Responsible for Contract**
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC)
2000 College Street, Sherbrooke, QC J1M 0C8

**Procurement Details**
Bidders are invited to submit proposals for the installation of nine (9) street lights at the Sherbrooke Research and Development Centre (RDC Sherbrooke). The contract includes:

* Planning, supply, moving, and installation of street lights
* Connection to existing electrical network
* Relocation of two existing street lights and removal of one (1) existing light fixture

**Visite des lieux:**
Firms interested in submitting a proposal are encouraged to visit the work site. A non-mandatory site visit will be held on August 15, 2023.

**Submission Guidelines**
Bidders must submit their proposals electronically through the CanadaBuy platform. 
Bidders who do not follow these guidelines risk having their proposal disallowed.

**Contract Officer's Contact Information**
Carol Rahal, Contracts Officer
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
2001 Robert-Bourassa, Room 671-TEN
Montréal, QC H3A 3N2
carol.rahal@agr.gc.ca
(418) 231-3209

**Additional Information**
* The contract will run from September 11, 2023 to December 20, 2023.
* A fixed price contract will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest quote.
* Bidders must demonstrate evidence of their qualification to carry out this type of work.

**Files**
Attachments are available for download through the CanadaBuy platform. Please refer to the following links:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6985/addedum-3_0.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6985/q-et-r-2-and-addendum-3.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6985/addedum-2.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6985/addedum-1_1.pdf
* https://canadabuys
